name: BRUCE
description:
[This game is only optimized for the desktop experience]

Bruce's owner went out and now he is sad. So sad that he is not able to find his toys and treats! Help him find his toys and treats to lift his spirits.

He is getting more distraught though by the second so try to find them soon. 

Instructions: Click on the arrows to explore the room. Click on objects in the room to find where the toys are hidden. 

This game was made with infojunkie and Bruce.

No animals were harmed in the making of this game.
